sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchStudents } from "../services/studentServices" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export const Students = () => { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchStudents().then((data) => { setStudents(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, []) return ( <>

My students

Please click on an icon to see your student's information

    {students.map((student) => (

  • {student.firstName} {student.lastName}

    Grade: {student.grade}

    • ))}
) }
